function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Financial risks in OECD countries due to living costs","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of socially vulnerable categories","Mitigation":"Financial support for socially vulnerable categories, sustainable use of resources","Technologies":"Smart systems for sustainable use of electricity and water","People":"Socially vulnerable categories","Owner":"Government, NGOs"},{"Description":"Disruption of supply chains and logistical challenges during quarantine","Impact":"Scarce reserves of food and medicine supplies, dissatisfaction among people","Mitigation":"Resilient food systems, local supply chains, urban farming technologies","Technologies":"Resilient food systems, local market technologies, urban farming technologies","People":"General public, residents, consumers","Owner":"Local governments, businesses"},{"Description":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long supply paths","Impact":"Higher chance of virus transmission, increased risk to public health","Mitigation":"Development of self-sufficient local markets, shorter supply paths","Technologies":"Urban farming technologies, local market technologies","People":"General public, residents, consumers","Owner":"Local governments, businesses"}]}
